project.name: fspec.videos
project.vision: Create automated, consistent, and reproducible demo videos of fspec's Terminal User Interface, enabling scalable documentation and onboarding through scripted terminal recordings.

primaryProblem.title: Manual terminal demo recording is time-consuming, error-prone, and difficult to maintain
primaryProblem.description: When creating documentation and tutorials for fspec, developers need to produce demo videos showing the TUI in action. Manual recording requires screen capture software, careful typing to avoid mistakes, and multiple takes to achieve professional results. Each time fspec's UI changes or new features are added, all affected videos must be re-recorded from scratch. This creates a maintenance burden that makes it impractical to maintain a comprehensive library of up-to-date demo videos. The result is either outdated documentation or significant time investment in manual video production.

solutionSpace.overview: Automated demo video generation through scriptable terminal interactions, allowing developers to define demo scenarios as code that can be executed and recorded on demand. Demo scripts are version-controlled alongside the codebase, ensuring videos stay synchronized with features and can be regenerated instantly whenever the UI changes.

capabilities.name: Record Terminal Demo Videos
capabilities.description: Execute demo scripts and capture the terminal interactions as video files with configurable size, FPS, and format

capabilities.name: Write Scriptable Demo Scenarios
capabilities.description: Define terminal interaction scenarios as version-controlled TypeScript scripts using the tui-test framework

capabilities.name: List Available Demo Scripts
capabilities.description: View all available demo scripts in the project

personas.name: fspec Documentation Maintainer
personas.description: Developer responsible for maintaining fspec's documentation, including demo videos
goals: Generate professional demo videos quickly and consistently
Regenerate videos whenever fspec UI changes

personas.name: Demo Script Author
personas.description: Developer who writes TypeScript demo scripts that define terminal interaction scenarios
goals: Script terminal interactions in a maintainable way
